panel.name: ccwidget_community

instance.name: tab_button
instance.onclick: ShowOnly('clan_list'); showWidget('clans_listbox_member'); showWidget('clans_listbox_officer'); showWidget('clans_listbox_leader'); SetEnabled(false); Call('tab_button_friends', 'SetEnabled(true);'); if(!IsInClan(),ShowOnly('clan_list_none')); if(IsInClan(), Split(if(IsClanOfficer(),ShowOnly('clan_list_officer')), if(IsClanLeader(),ShowOnly('clan_list_leader')), if(!IsClanOfficer and !IsClanLeader(),ShowOnly('clan_list_member'))));

listbox.name: friends_listbox
listbox.onhover: If(ChatUpdateHoverInfo(Substring(this,1,-1)), If(StringLength(this), Split( ShowWidget('hover_tip'), If(!(StringLength(*('cc_friendlist_'#Substring(this,1,-1))) gt 0) and (StringLength(ChatHoverClan) gt 0), Split( Cmd('Set cc_friendlist_'#Substring(this,1,-1)#' ????'), HTTPGetFile('http://masterserver.savage2.s2games.com/account_info.php?nickname='#Substring(this,1,-1),'~/webcache/friends/'#LowerString(Substring(this,1,-1))#'.cfg'), HTTPGetFile('http://masterserver.savage2.s2games.com/account_info.php?nickname='#Substring(this,1,-1),'~/webcache/friends/'#LowerString(Substring(this,1,-1))#'.cfg') )), If(!(StringLength(*('cc_friendlist_'#Substring(this,1,-1))) gt 4), Exec('~/webcache/friends/'#LowerString(Substring(this,1,-1))#'.cfg') ))), HideWidget('hover_tip'));

label.onframe: if(ChatInGame(), SetText('Players in current game:'), SetText('Players in current channel:'));

panel.label: You are not currently in a clan.
If you are interested in joining a clan, change your status below. Your status will be viewable by clan leaders.

listbox.name: clans_listbox_member
listbox.ondoubleclick: if(Substring(this,0,2) == '01' or Substring(this,0,2) == '02' or Substring(this,0,2) == '03' or Substring(this,0,2) == '05' or Substring(this,0,2) == '06' or Substring(this,0,2) == '07', ChatOpenMessage(ui_lastSelectedUser));

listbox.name: clans_listbox_officer
listbox.ondoubleclick: if(Substring(this,0,2) == '01' or Substring(this,0,2) == '02' or Substring(this,0,2) == '03' or Substring(this,0,2) == '05' or Substring(this,0,2) == '06' or Substring(this,0,2) == '07', ChatOpenMessage(ui_lastSelectedUser));

listbox.name: clans_listbox_leader
listbox.ondoubleclick: if(Substring(this,0,2) == '01' or Substring(this,0,2) == '02' or Substring(this,0,2) == '03' or Substring(this,0,2) == '05' or Substring(this,0,2) == '06' or Substring(this,0,2) == '07', ChatOpenMessage(ui_lastSelectedUser));

instance.name: round_button2
instance.label: Invite
instance.onclick: ShowWidget('clan_invite'); HideWidget('clan_list_leader'); SetFocus(1); hideWidget('clans_listbox_member'); hideWidget('clans_listbox_officer'); hideWidget('clans_listbox_leader');

instance.name: round_button2
instance.label: Cancel
instance.onclick: hideWidget('clan_invite'); showWidget('clan_list_leader'); SetFocus(1); showWidget('clans_listbox_member'); showWidget('clans_listbox_officer'); showWidget('clans_listbox_leader');

panel.label: To invite players please visit www.savage2clans.com and administrate the clan roster.

listbox.name: clan_listbox_add_current
listbox.onrightclick: PlaySound('/shared/sounds/ui/button_rightclick.mp3'); Call('clan_listbox_add_rtclick', 'SetVisible(true);'); Call('clan_listbox_add_rtclick', 'SetX(\'' # param0 # '\');'); Call('clan_listbox_add_rtclick', 'SetY(\'' # param1 # '\');'); Call('clan_listbox_add_rtclick_choices', 'ListBoxCmd(\'SelectNone\');'); SetFocusName('clan_listbox_add_rtclick');

panel.name: tab_notifications
panel.label: Select which notifications you would like to view.

instance.name: round_button2
instance.label: Save
instance.onclick: SetSave('cc_showConnectionNotification'); SetSave('cc_showDisconnectionNotification'); SetSave('cc_showJoinGameNotification'); SetSave('cc_showLeaveGameNotification'); SetSave('cc_showBuddyAddedNotification'); SetSave('cc_showBuddyRemovedNotification'); SetSave('cc_showClanMessageNotification'); SetSave('cc_showClanRankNotification'); SetSave('cc_showClanAddNotification'); SetSave('cc_showClanRemoveNotification'); SetSave('cc_optionOpenChat'); SetSave('cc_optionBarBottom'); SetSave('ni_ticketNotificationOff'); SetSave('ni_clanIconsDownloadOff'); SetFocus(1);

instance.name: config_button
instance.onclick: ShowOnly('config'); hideWidget('friends_listbox'); hideWidget('clans_listbox_member'); hideWidget('clans_listbox_officer'); hideWidget('clans_listbox_leader'); Call('tab_button_friends', 'SetEnabled(true);'); Call('tab_button_clan', 'SetEnabled(true);');

webimage.ontrigger: Cmd('Set cc_friendlist_ci #Choose(0,|#cc_friendlist_'#If(StringEquals(ChatHoverClan,'None'),ChatHoverName,GetAccountName())#'|#)#'); If(StringEquals(cc_friendlist_ci,'None') or ni_clanIconsDownloadOff, SetTexture('/ui/elements/vclan_transparent.tga'), SetTextureWeb(cc_friendlist_ci));
